data.title: Kiefer Berard, Amy
data.text:
About Kiefer Berard...

Position: Science Teacher Room: C209 Phone: (480)224-2100 Email: Kiefer Berard

Connect With Us

Welcome!

Welcome to Biology. My first priority is to help ALL of my students SUCCEED. There is never a bad question. If you have a question let me know. How: Email at kieferberard.amy@cusd80.com Text at (520) 344-2022 All emails and text messages will be sent to my personal phone. I will see it and I will respond as soon as possible at least within 24 hours.

My Education and Professional Background

I earned my Bachelors of Science in Biology from ASU. I earned my Masters of Education in Curriculum and Instruction from ASU.

My Educational Philosophy

I am here to help you succeed. You are not alone. If you are the student doing the work, you have a team of people here to support you and help you succeed. If you are a team member, you are part of a TEAM, reach out and ask me your questions. | Email Amy Kiefer Berard
